name: Ghost Camera 3D
description:
Use ghost camera 3d to have ghosts in your PHOTOS and VIDEOS!!! Or just play with them!!!

Ghost Camera 3D is a simulation game which uses your device's camera and simulates 3D ghosts in front of you.

You can select one of ghost models, do ghost photos and ghost videos with camera. Besides seeing ghost in your photos its possible play with them as all ghosts are interactive, they can attack, move, make sounds, get hit and die.

Ghost Camera use gyroscope to make ghosts move depending to device movements, this makes ghosts more realistic.

Enjoy ghost camera and share your ghost photos and videos!!!
